textContent:
At the center of the map there's a monolithic structure, designed to make you awe at it. That's the endgame. It's an entire zone designed like an open-world raid. It's filled with invisible monsters that need Insight to be seen. You climb up the structure until you find the final boss. 
THE SIGNS OF A PREVIOUS CIVILIZATION ARE OBVIOUS FROM THE START. Still, the castaways must find resources and establish a base first.
Anyone can try to enter, just like Hyrule's Castle, but only a few can actually climb through it. Hardest content in the game.
title: The Goal
textContentHtml:
At the center of the map there's a monolithic structure, designed to make you awe at it. That's the endgame. It's an entire zone designed like an open-world raid. It's filled with invisible monsters that need Insight to be seen. You climb up the structure until you find the final boss. 

THE SIGNS OF A PREVIOUS CIVILIZATION ARE OBVIOUS FROM THE START. Still, the castaways must find resources and establish a base first.

Anyone can try to enter, just like Hyrule's Castle, but only a few can actually climb through it. Hardest content in the game.
